return.description:
If no error is found, oci_error returns
   FALSE. Otherwise, oci_error returns the
   error information as an associative array.oci_error Array Description

    
     
      
       Array key
       Type
       Description
      
     
     
      
       code
       integer
       
         The Oracle error number.
       
      
      
       message
       string
       
         The Oracle error text.
       
      
      
       offset
       integer
       
         The byte position of an error in the SQL statement.  If there
         was no statement, this is 0
       
      
      
       sqltext
       string
       
         The SQL statement text.  If there was no statement, this is
         an empty string.

notes.description:
In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must
    use ocierror instead. The old function name can still be used
in current versions, however it is deprecated and not recommended.

changelog.change:
The offset and sqltext
        entries were added.
